Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42282 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-42282 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 16.20.2-3, affected by CVE-2023-42282
